Producer: Cristina Costantini, Darren Foster, Jeff Plunkett
Screenwriter: Jeff Plunkett, Darren Foster, Cristina Costantini
Synopsis: Filmmakers follow nine high school students from around the globe as they compete at an international science fair. Facing off against 1,700 of the smartest teens from 78 countries, only one will be named Best in Fair.
Title: Science Fair
